name: Savera Swayamsevi Sangathan
briefDescription: Our Mission statement is “Transformational         development     of the people through participatory practices on sustained basic”. We focus Women, child and Disability. At present our organization is undertaking various activities under following components- School,Playschool for rural area, Livelihood programme,Computer Training Programme, skill training programme, Health, Campaign on child labour, Street children, Environment, , etc.
